name: Cost Performance Index (CPI)
Schedule Variance (SV)
script:
pv = doc.custom_planned_value or 0
ev = doc.custom_earned_value or 0

# Calculate SV
doc.custom_schedule_variance = ev - pv

# Status Logic
if doc.custom_schedule_variance > 0:
    doc.custom_sv_status = "Ahead"
elif doc.custom_schedule_variance == 0:
    doc.custom_sv_status = "On Time"
else:
    doc.custom_sv_status = "Behind"

name: Cost Variance (CV)
script:
ev = doc.custom_earned_value or 0
ac = doc.custom_actual_cost or 0

# Calculate CV
doc.custom_cost_variance = ev - ac

# Status Logic
if doc.custom_cost_variance > 0:
    doc.custom_cv_status = "Under Budget"
elif doc.custom_cost_variance == 0:
    doc.custom_cv_status = "On Budget"
else:
    doc.custom_cv_status = "Over Budget"
